item.title: A Shiny New World
item.description: Jump to Section: Brief Introduction Example Apps Resources for Beginners Introduction I recently gave a talk about R and Shiny at a meetup in Chicago, specifically about an app I recently created called IDBac. While there are plenty of example apps for Shiny I also wanted to create some examples of my own for now and any future instruction. Since the meetup had some scheduled time for attendees to work in groups or on their own I thought a nice demonstration of Shiny would be an app that could interactively create groups based on a self-reported skill level.
